text: The Error Correction System (ECS) is used when UDRs fail validation and manual intervention is needed before they can be successfully processed. Batches are sent to the ECS using an APL command. To send UDRs, the ECS forwarding agent is required. To collect data from the ECS, the ECS collection agent is used. UDRs may be examined, deleted, or updated in the ECS Inspector. This section contains the following subsections: ECS Maintenance System Task ECS Forwarding Agent ECS Collection Agent ECS Inspection ECS Statistics Example - ECS handling of UDRs Example - ECS handling of Batches
title: Error Correction System - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
